main.name: Alejandro De Jesus
main.description: As a mobile developer I have gained a lot of experience through several projects. I have accomplished a wide range of frontend and backend programming languages and frameworks.
main.bio: I specialize in React Native, iOS, JavaScript, Swift, Xcode, firebase, fastlane, unit testing, solidity, TDD, redux, fastlane, jest and API Gateway. Iâ€™ve been working on modern Javascript frameworks and libraries like Redux, React Native. I implement industry best practices for search engine, optimization, performance, accessibility, and testing. I always like to write clean code that will be easy for future developers to work on. I am constantly learning and evolving as a programmer. The technologies that I am learning are solidity, smart contracts and typescript, I enjoy working and learning with teammates.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
